sentences.sContent: The days of the well-groomed metrosexual man might soon be over as the "lumbersexual" trend takes precedence.
sentences.sContent_eng: The days of the well-groomed metrosexual man might soon be over as the "lumbersexual" trend takes precedence.
sentences.sCn: 衣着整洁的都市美男时代可能不久就要结束了，因为“木匠美男”们正在成为新宠。

remMethod.val: well(好)+groom(修饰)+ed → 整齐干净的， 衣着入时的

trans.tranCn: 整齐干净的， 衣着入时的
trans.tranOther: someone who is well-groomed looks very neat and clean
